optional.description: Parameter defining the ScanCode output format. Possible values are: json, json-pp, spdx-tv, spdx-json, spdx-rdf. Json-pp stands for json pretty printed. Default: spdx-json.
A natural number between 0 (low macht accuracy) and 100 (high match accuracy). Default 0.
The number of processes used by ScanCode. A "good" value is the number of CPUs minus 1 (more information: https://github.com/nexB/scancode-toolkit/issues/2980#issuecomment-1146583845). Default 1.
Extractcode is a helper tool, which extracts archives before scanning. Set it to `true` to enable it. Default: `false`.
Parameter defining the ScanCode output format. Possible values are: json, json-pp, spdx-tv, spdx-json, spdx-rdf. Json-pp stands for json pretty printed. Default: spdx-json.
